question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his/her help in arranging it,
text: I am writing this letter regarding the opportunity to work for a period of six months, at our matrix in Ottawa, Canada.

Let me start by explaining that during this period at our head office, I will be participating in an internal case study on rail transportation. Such a topic has been part of one of our main projects here and I would say that having another perspective on the issue, in our head office, will help our project here.

Moving to the issues on how my work at our local office will not be affected is because I will be able to continue working on the projects and participating in probably all the team meetings, otherwise, my co-worker Jhon agreed to help me.

In order to apply for spending this period at our matrix, it is required a letter of recommendation from my manager. Therefore, I would like to kindly ask if you could provide me with this letter and also stating that this temporary move will be beneficial to our filial here in Brazil.
I am looking forward to a response at your earliest convenience.
